verses.name: Joshua 19:11
verses.text: And their border went up toward the sea, and Maralah, and reached to Dabbasheth, and reached to the river that is before Jokneam;

verses.name: Joshua 19:12
verses.text: And turned from Sarid eastward toward the sunrising unto the border of Chisloth–tabor, and then goeth out to Daberath, and goeth up to Japhia,

verses.name: Joshua 19:13
verses.text: And from thence passeth on along on the east to Gittah–hepher, to Ittah–kazin, and goeth out to Remmon–methoar to Neah;

verses.name: Joshua 19:14
verses.text: And the border compasseth it on the north side to Hannathon: and the outgoings thereof are in the valley of Jiphthah–el:
